Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two people who need to communicate over a long distance.
The student can draw a device connecting the two people, such as a string telephone.
The student can show that the device uses sound to send information between the two people.
The student can illustrate how the device helps the people talk to each other from far away.
The student can indicate the materials used to make the device based on what is provided.
